import Header from "../header"; import Footer from "../footer"; import { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Head from 'next/head' import { toast, ToastContainer } from 'react-nextjs-toast' export default function Category(product) { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const [minQty] = useState(product.minOrderQuantity ? product.minOrderQuantity : 1) const [maxOrder] = useState(product.minOrderQuantity ? product.minOrderQuantity : 1) const [step] = useState(product.step ? product.step : 1) const setQuantity = (val) => { if (val < minQty) { toast.notify(`Invalid quantity, minimum order : ${minQty}`, { type: "error", title: "Quantity Error!!!" }) return; } val = parseFloat(val) setQty(val) } return ( {product.metaTitle ? product.metaTitle : product.name}

); } export async function getServerSideProps(context) { let product = await axios.get(`${process.env.API_URL}products/${context.params.slug}`) product = product.data; return { props: product } }
